entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SHOWERS THIS EVENING, THEN MOSTLY CLEAR AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING NORTH AFTER MIDNIGHT
CHANCE OF RAIN 20 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
COOLER WITH HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
NORTHEAST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF RAIN SHOWERS IN THE EVENING, THEN RAIN SHOWERS LIKELY AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
NORTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

CLOUDY
RAIN SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE MORNING
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
EAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

CLOUDY WITH A 50 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
SOUTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A 50 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
NOT AS COOL WITH HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH SHOWERS LIKELY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY
HIGHS AROUND 70
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING, THEN SHOWERS LIKELY AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE EVENING, THEN A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH SHOWERS LIKELY
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT
